snippet: Iran’s insistence on the lifting of a ban on shipments of conventional weapons in and out of the country has become an obstacle to an accord.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s insistence on the lifting of a ban on shipments of conventional weapons in and out of the country has become an obstacle to an accord.

headline.main: Iran Nuclear Talks Still Face ‘Difficult Issues,’ Kerry Says
headline.print_headline: Kerry Sees ‘Difficult Issues’ in Iran Talks
